text.div:
This value set contains 23 concepts

CodeSystemDisplay
  POI-1http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesAadhar Identity Card
  POI-2http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesPassport
  POI-3http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesDriving License
  POI-4http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesElection Commision's Voter ID card
  POI-5http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesIncome Tax PAN Card
  POI-6http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesPhoto Credit Card/ Debit card (with Photo)
  POI-7http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesECHS / CGHS Card having photo
  POI-8http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesDomicile Certificate / Caste Certificate with photograph
  POI-9http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesCurrent passbook of Post Office / Govt. /PSU Bank/private banks
  POI-10http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesStudent ID card of the Govt. recognized educational institutions with photograph on it.
  POI-11http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesRation Card with photograph & address. (Issued from Maharashtra state not valid )
  POI-12http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesSmart Card issued by CSD, Defence / Paramilitary Forces
  POI-13http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesArms License
  POI-14http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesSenior Citizen Card having photo issued by the Govt.
  POI-15http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesPensioners Card having photo issued by the Govt.
  POI-16http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesID Card issued to Tibetan (Refugees) Citizens by State Govt. / Central Govt. of India having photo
  POI-17http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesDefence Personnel - Armed Forces ;Certificate from Competent Unit Authority
  POI-18http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesCertificate of Address having Photo, issued by MP/ MLA / Group A Gazetted Officer on letter head with seal
  POI-19http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesCertificate of address with photo from Govt. recognized educational institution (for students only)
  POI-20http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesCertificate of Address having Photo, issued by Head of Village / Gram Panchayat or its equivalent Authority. (for Rural Areas)
  POI-21http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesAddress Card with Photo issued by Dept. of Posts
  POI-23http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesFreedom fighter card with photo
  POI-24http://hcxprotocol.io/codes/proof-of-identity-codesKissan Passbook with photo

name: ProofOfIdentityCodes
description: This is the value set listing the Proof of Identification codes

contains.display: Aadhar Identity Card
Passport
Driving License
Election Commision's Voter ID card
Income Tax PAN Card
Photo Credit Card/ Debit card (with Photo)
ECHS / CGHS Card having photo
Domicile Certificate / Caste Certificate with photograph
Current passbook of Post Office / Govt. /PSU Bank/private banks
Student ID card of the Govt. recognized educational institutions with photograph on it.
Ration Card with photograph & address. (Issued from Maharashtra state not valid )
Smart Card issued by CSD, Defence / Paramilitary Forces
Arms License
Senior Citizen Card having photo issued by the Govt.
Pensioners Card having photo issued by the Govt.
ID Card issued to Tibetan (Refugees) Citizens by State Govt. / Central Govt. of India having photo
Defence Personnel - Armed Forces ;Certificate from Competent Unit Authority
Certificate of Address having Photo, issued by MP/ MLA / Group A Gazetted Officer on letter head with seal
Certificate of address with photo from Govt. recognized educational institution (for students only)
Certificate of Address having Photo, issued by Head of Village / Gram Panchayat or its equivalent Authority. (for Rural Areas)
Address Card with Photo issued by Dept. of Posts
Freedom fighter card with photo
Kissan Passbook with photo
